name: Lovers Defense
description:
Use WASD or arrow keys to move Aim and shoot with the mouse

You goal as Cupid is to protect those lovers by shooting at demons (Left click to shoot).

You can move the lovers by pushing them to avoid them to walk on trap or corps.

This game was realized in 5 days from scratch, and it is my second game, and the first that other people will play, so i hope you will enjoy it :) 

In any case, i enjoyed making it, even if the theme didn't really inspire me. And i am pretty happy with the result (even if this game is not very fun ^^' that is what i expected to do)
